level.heading: Rights, remedies, prohibitions; cumulative.
level.text: The rights, remedies, and prohibitions accorded by the provisions of this chapter are in addition to and cumulative of any right, remedy, or prohibition accorded by the common law or any statute of the District of Columbia and nothing contained herein shall be construed to deny, abrogate, or impair any such common law or statutory right, remedy, or prohibition.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 15-227
level.text: For Law 15-227, see notes following ยง 34-1651.01.
